item.title: 10 Amazing Health Benefits of Drinking Water
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Water is essential to the human body’s basic functioning. It makes up around 60-70 percent of the human body. Drinking water has numerous advantages and can improve your overall health. According to the World Health Organization, having access to safe drinking water regularly is a human right.
